resources.string: First day of the week in all calendars
Habitica is available as open source software on Github
It’s time to have fun while you get things done. Join over %s others improving their life one task at a time.
Unlock features in the game by checking off your real life tasks. Earn armour, pets, and more as rewards for meeting your goals.
Keep your goals on track with help from your friends. Support each other in life and in battle as you improve together!
So, how would you like to look? Don\'t worry, you can change this later.
Great! Now, what are you interested in working on throughout this journey?
Study a master of the craft
Are you sure you want to cancel this quest? All invitation acceptances will be lost. The quest owner will retain possession of the quest scroll.
You wrestle with the Armoire and gain Experience. Take that!
Mages learn Skills that damage Bosses and boost EXP and Mana. Play a Mage if you’re motivated by leveling up quickly! Mages benefit from a high Intelligence stat.
Rogues learn Skills that let them and their Party find more Gold and random drops. Play a Rogue if you want lots of items and Gold! Rogues benefit from a high Perception stat.
Healers learn Skills that can heal and protect themselves and their Party. Play a Healer if you enjoy assisting others or avoiding damage! Healers benefit from a high Constitution stat.
Are you sure you want to be a %s?
Opt out of the class system\?
If a friend joins Habitica via your email, they\'ll automatically be invited to your party!
I got to level %d in #Habitica by improving my real-life habits!
I just hatched a %1$s %2$s pet in #Habitica by completing my real-life tasks!
I just gained a %1$s mount in #Habitica by completing my real-life tasks!
Do you want to change class for 3 Gems\?
This will refund your stat points, switch which gear is unlocked in shops, and change your available skills.
Do you really want to delete?
You were invited to join a party!
You completed all your dailies. Well done!
Google Play services could not be found.
Buying gems supports the developers and helps keep Habitica running
Gems allow you to buy fun extras for your account
Quests that reward you with pet eggs
The ability to change your class before level 100
Not getting the right drops? Check out the Market!
Need different food? Buy more from the market!
Your Dailies will next reset the first time you use Habitica after %1$s. Make sure you have completed your Dailies before this time!
Subscribing supports our small team and helps keep Habitica running
Stay motivated with even more rewards when you subscribe
Get up to 50 Gold-purchasable Gems in the Market to buy Quests, Customizations, Pets, and more!
Earn Mystic Hourglasses to purchase items in the Time Traveler’s Shop!
Subscribe now to get an exclusive set now and receive new items every month!
Receive the Royal Purple Jackalope pet when you become a new subscriber.

No longer want to subscribe\? You can find the option to unsubscribe in the “My Apps” section of the Google Play Store. Any months of subscription credit will be applied after your subscription has ended.

No longer want to subscribe\? Due to constraints on mobile payments, you\'ll need to cancel via our website. To do this, tap the button below, log in to your account, tap the User icon in the top right, then go to Subscription. Any months of subscription credit will be applied after your subscription has ended. We\'ll miss you!
You get these benefits for being a Subscriber
You’re not part of any Challenges right now!
Join a Challenge to add a curated set of tasks to your list, then compete against other Habiticans to win achievements and even gems!
Tap the “Public” tab to find the user-created Challenges that are the best fit for you!
Because you subscribe to Habitica, you can purchase a number of Gems each month using Gold.
Each month, subscribers will receive a mystery item. This is usually released about one week before the end of the month.
You earned a %1$s as a reward for your devotion to improving your life.
Your next prize unlocks at %1$d Check-Ins
Habits are tasks that don\'t have a rigid schedule. You can check them off many times a day, or not at all.
Dailies are tasks that repeat on a regular basis. Choose the schedule that works for you!
You don\'t have any To Do\'s
To Do\'s are tasks that only need to be completed once. Add checklists to your To Do\'s to increase their value.
Review our Community Guidelines before posting
With this option set, the Dailies tasks will default to ‘due’ instead of ‘all’
Your device does not have any of the supported payment methods. Please use the Habitica website if you want to purchase gems.
Your device does not have any of the supported payment methods. Please use the Habitica website if you want to purchase a subscription.
You don\'t have enough gems to create a challenge.
You need to add at least one task to create this Challenge.
You need a title to create this Challenge.
Check off any Dailies you did yesterday:
Are you sure you want to leave the Party?
Are you sure you want to abort this mission? It will abort it for everyone in your party and all progress will be lost. The quest scroll will be returned to the quest owner.
This will delete your account forever, and it can never be restored! Banked or spent Gems will not be refunded. If you’re absolutely certain, type your password into the text box below.
By accomplishing your real life goals, you levelled up and are now fully healed!
Remember to check off your tasks
Are you sure\? Only %1$d of your %2$d party members have joined this quest! Quests start automatically when all players have joined or rejected the invitation.
You have tamed %s, let\'s go for a ride!

Need a break\? Check into Daniel’s Inn to pause some of Habitica’s more difficult game mechanics: 
 
 • Your missed Dailies won't damage you (bosses will still do damage caused by other Party member's missed Dailies) 
 • Your Task streaks and Habit counters will not reset 
 • Your damage to the Quest boss or found collection items will remain pending until you check out of the Inn
Warriors score more critical hits and deal heavy damage to Bosses. Play a Warrior if you want to defeat monsters easily! Warriors benefit from a high Strength stat.
Change your class and refund your stat points for 3 gems.
If you have friends already using Habitica, invite them by username here.
You don\'t have any messages. You can send a player a new message from their public chat messages!
Unlock by logging into Habitica regularly
Oh, you must be new here. I’m Justin, I’ll be your guide in Habitica. \n \nFirst, what should we call you\? Feel free to change what I picked. When you’re all set, let’s create your avatar!
You need at least 1 gem to create a public challenge.
Identify your challenge with a short name
You need a short name to create this Challenge.
This will delete your account forever, and it can never be restored! Banked or spent Gems will not be refunded. If you’re absolutely certain, type DELETE into the text box below.
You need to complete more tasks before you can afford this item!
You\'ll need more Gems to buy this item!
You\'ll need more Mystic Hourglasses to buy this item!
Earn one Mystic Hourglass for every three months of consecutive subscription, then use them to unlock limited edition items, pets, and mounts from the past… and future!
The Grand Galas happen close to the solstices and equinoxes, so check back then to find a fun assortment of special seasonal items!
If you’ve encountered a bug or made a mistake that unfairly changed your character, you can manually correct those values here.
Enter the email address you used to register your Habitica account.
If we have your email on file, instructions for setting a new password have been sent to your email.
Each level earns you one point to assign to an attribute of your choice. You can do so manually, or let the match decide for you using one of the Automatic Allocation options.
Increases the bonus of critical hits and makes them more likely when scoring a task. Also increases damage dealt to bosses.
Increases EXP earned from completing tasks. Also increases your mana cap and how fast mana regenerates over time.
Decreases the amount of damage taken from your tasks. Does not decrease the damage received from bosses.
Increases the likelihood of finding drops when completing Tasks, the daily drop-cap, Streak Bonuses, and the amount of gold awarded for Tasks.
Assigns the same number of points to each attribute.
Assigns more points to the attributes important to your Class.
Assigns points based on the Strength, Intelligence, Constitution, and Perception categories associated with the tasks you complete.
You already have all equipment! More will be released during the Grand Galas, near the solstices and equinoxes.
This item is only available to a specific class. \nYou can change your class from Settings.
You can only purchase gear for your current class
Habitica tries to create a welcoming environment for users of all ages and backgrounds, especially in public spaces like the Tavern. If you have any questions, please consult our guidelines.
The colored usernames you see in chat represent a person’s contributor tier. The higher the tier, the more the person has contributed to Habitica through art, code, the community, or more!
Our beloved %1$s was devastated when the %2$s shattered the %3$s. Quickly, tackle your tasks to defeat the monster and help rebuild!!
Take on quests with friends or on your own. Battle monsters, create Challenges, and help yourself stay accountable through Parties.
Give a Party member the username found below and they can send you an invite
You have bought all the Gems you can this month. More become available within the first three days of each month. Thanks for subscribing!
A World Boss is a special event where the whole community works together to take down a powerful monster with their tasks!
Complete tasks to damage the Boss
The Boss won’t damage you for missed tasks, but its Rage metre will go up. If the bar fills up, the Boss will attack one of the shopkeepers!
You can continue with normal Quest Bosses, damage will apply to both
Check the Tavern to see Boss progress and Rage attacks
Defeat the Boss to earn special rewards and save Habitica from %s’s Terror!
Attribute point allocation unlocks at level 10
have you added your tasks yet\?
The more you add, the more you\'ll be rewarded. Even small habits add up to big change.
Did you check off your tasks today\?
There\'s lots to unlock and discover as you level up, so keep up with your tasks and have fun!
Want to try something new\? Join a Challenge to expand your task list and win some Gems!
Add checklists to your To Do\'s to multiply your rewards!
You can change how often each Daily repeats. Even infrequent tasks can be schedulled.
You can schedule specific reminders for Dailies too.
Occasionally re-evaluating your tasks can help keep you on the right path.
Take a few deep breaths to help you focus. You can do this!
Try setting a timer for ten minutes and seeing how much you can get done!
Try pinning items from the Market to your Rewards to help motivate you to earn them!
You can change your task\'s difficulty to reward yourself more for hard tasks!
If you\'re having a tough time, try breaking your tasks down into smaller parts.
Breaks are healthy, but you can still earn points for simple activities to level up and get cool gear!
It’s time to set your username!
Login names are now unique usernames that will be visible beside your display name and used for invitations, chat @mentions, and messaging.
If you’d like to learn more about this change, visit our wiki.
Usernames should conform to our Terms of Service and Community Guidelines. If you didn’t previously set a login name, your username was auto-generated.
Are you sure you want to confirm your current username\?
Confirming your username will make it public for invitations, @mentions and messaging. You can change your username from settings at any time.
One of these Veteran Pets will be waiting for you after you’ve finished confirming!
Display names must be between 1 and 30 characters
You can either complete this To Do, edit it, or remove it.
Watch TV, play a game, eat a treat, it’s up to you!
Want to give the benefits of a subscription to someone else\?
Gift a sub and get a sub free event going on now!
Who would you like to gift to\?
While this promotion is active, you’ll receive a matching subscription automatically after sending your gift.
Choose the subscription you’d like to gift below! This purchase won’t automatically renew.
The notification fairies give you a raucous round of applause! Well done!
%1$s has invited you to join the party %2$s
You were invited to the Quest %1$s
In honor of the season of giving we\'re bringing back a very special promotion. Now when you gift somebody a subscription, you get the same sub for yourself for free!
Gift a subscription now and you’ll get the same sub for yourself free!

You have a free subscription because you are an owner of a Party or Guild that has a Group Plan. This will end if you cancel the plan. Any months of extra subscription credit you have will be applied at the end of the Group Plan. You can cancel from the Habitica website.

You have a free subscription because you are a member a Party or Guild that has a Group Plan. This will end if you leave or the Group Plan is cancelled by the owner. Any months of extra subscription credit you have will be applied at the end of the Group Plan.
Want to continue your benefits\? You can start a new subscription before this one runs out to keep your benefits active.
Choose the Subscription length that works for you
%1$s invited you to join their group %2$s
Your password has to be at least %d characters long
Enter how many of your Gems you\'d like to send below or switch tabs to purchase Gems to gift
Habitica will never require you to gift gems to other players. Begging people for gems is a violation of the Community Guidelines and should be reported to admin@habitica.com.
Want to bestow a shiny haul of Gems to someone else\?
Become a Subscriber to buy Gems with gold, get monthly mystery items, increased drop caps and more!

You put yourself to the test by joining a Challenge!
Ventured into the social side of Habitica by joining a Guild!

You have earned the “Mount Master” achievement for taming all the mounts!
You have earned the “Beast Master” Achievement for collecting all the pets!
You teamed up with a party member!
You open the box and receive a %s
Are you sure you want to remove %s from the group\?
This will make %s the new Party leader
Choose a class that fits your playstyle and unlock special skills and armour to help you on your journey

**Only** report a post that violates the [Community Guidelines](https://habitica.com/static/community-guidelines) and/or [Terms of Service](https://habitica.com/static/terms). Inappropriately reporting a post may give you an infraction.
Post a message in the %s to have your questions answered by a fellow player.
I agree to follow the guidelines
Do you want to leave the guild and keep or leave the challenges\?
Either a Habit, a Daily or a To Do
Tap here to edit this into a bad habit you\'d like to quit
Or delete it from the edit screen

Tap ‘Gift a Subscription’ and type in the username of the account you’d like to gift to. From there, pick the sub length you’d like to gift and check out. Your account will automatically be rewarded with the same level of subscription you just gifted.

This promotion only applies when you gift to another Habitican. If you or your gift recipient already have a subscription, the gifted subscription will add months of credit that will only be used after the current subscription is cancelled or expires.
You can purchase this customisation from the Time Travelers shop
Guidance with setting up your Habitica Account
You sent %1$s a %2$s-month Habitica subscription and the same subscription was applied to your account for our Gift One Get One promotion!
Choose the gem packet you’d like to gift below!
Give the username below to a friend or head to the %s to meet potential comrades!
There aren\'t any To Do\'s visible with your current filters.
There aren\'t any Dailies visible with your current filters.
There aren\'t any Habits visible with your current filters.
Discover even more items in Habitica with a 2x bonus daily drop cap.
Subscribe now to get this %s and receive new items every month!
Unlock by checking into Habitica %d times.
Your Username and/or Password was incorrect.
You are not connected to the internet.
You are unable to buy that amount.
We’re constantly pushing out new fixes, so be sure to check the Play Store to see if there are any updates available.
Sometimes the app won’t automatically update content. Try pulling to refresh or force closing the app and reopening it.
To clear your cache, open your phone’s Settings app. Go to Storage > Apps > Habitica, then tap Clear Cache.

Mystic Hourglasses are an extremely rare form of currency you can only receive for subscribing to Habitica for three consecutive months or more. They are used in the Time Traveler’s shop to buy past gear sets, pets, mounts, animated backgrounds, or even special quests. \n \nYou can receive up to four Mystic Hourglasses a year. The time they are rewarded is based on your subscription renewal schedule. They are sent out on the first day of a new month after your last subscription payment that qualified you for an hourglass. See the [Subscription] page for more details.

Gems are a currency purchased with real money that allow you to buy extra content within Habitica and are one of the main sources of financial support for the Habitica team alongside subscriptions. 
 
All content purchased through Gems is purely cosmetic or can be obtained for free with time. 
 
You can also receive Gems through gifts from other players, Challenge prizes, contributing to Habitica, or subscribing.

All Habitica characters have four stats that affect the gameplay aspects of Habitica. 
 
**Strength (STR)** affects critical hits and raises damage done to a Quest Boss. Warriors and Rogues gain STR from their class equipment. 
 
**Constitution (CON)** raises your HP and makes you take less damage. Healers and Warriors gain CON from their class equipment. 
 
**Intelligence (INT)** raises the amount of EXP you earn and gives you more Mana. Mages and Healers gain INT from their class equipment. 
 
**Perception (PER)** increases the gold you earn and the rate of finding dropped items.Rogues and Mages gain PER from their class equipment. 
 
After level 10, you earn 1 Stat Point every level you gain that you can put into any stat you’d like. You can also equip gear that has different combinations of stat boosts.

Mana points are unlocked with the class system at level 10 and allow you to **use Skills** once you begin learning them at level 11. \n \nSome **MP is restored** at day reset every day, but you can regain more by completing tasks or using a Mage class skill.

Gold is the **main form of currency** within Habitica and allows you to buy certain gear, quests, items, or even custom rewards you make for yourself. 
 
**Earn Gold** through completing tasks or quests, or through some Class skills. Higher **Perception stats** raise the amount of Gold you earn. 
 
If you subscribe to Habitica, you can even use Gold to purchase a number of Gems determined by the length of time you’ve been subscribed.

Experience points represent your progress and allow you to level up. You’ll mainly **gain EXP** from completing tasks or quests, but there are also some class skills that give EXP. \n \nTasks of higher difficulty, or red-colored tasks will give you **more EXP**. The **Intelligence stat** also raises your rate of EXP gain.

This represents your avatar’s life. Missing a Daily or doing a negative Habit **reduces your HP**. 
 
**Regain HP** by leveling up, using a Health Potion, or a class skill with healing ability. 
 
If your **HP reaches 0** you will lose a level, all Gold, and one piece of equipment. Lost equipment can be re-purchased.
Not sure how to best use Habitica\?
Send a bug report to us and we’ll get back to you!
We’re constantly trying to make our apps better based on player feedback but sometimes a few bugs pop up…
Did something go wrong\? Check for answers here or reach out to us for help.
Have input on how features could work better or an idea for something new\? Tell us!
We’ll explain the basics and answer common questions to get you up to speed
You can choose to keep this Challenge\'s tasks on your personal task board or delete them when you leave
This is one of %d tasks that are part of a Challenge that no longer exists. What would you like to do with these left over tasks\?
This is one of %1$d tasks that are part of the “%2$s” Challenge. You must leave the Challenge to delete this task.

You still need a %s Potion to hatch this pet again

You still need a %s Potion to hatch this pet

You only need %1$d %2$s to hatch all possible pets. Are you sure you want to purchase %3$d\?
If you want even more, check out Achievements and start collecting!
If you want even more, check out Achievements and start collecting!
You earned 5 Achievements and 100 Gold for your efforts.
Head to your Items and try combining your new Egg and Hatching Potion!
Completing tasks gives you a chance to find eggs, hatching potions, and pet food.
Equipment can be practical or just fashionable. Raise your stats to get all sorts of benefits to your avatar
Every Pet has a specific food they enjoy! Experiment to find out which will grow your Pet the fastest
There are so many Pets to collect, you’re bound to have a favorite. If you feed them, they may just grow…
A task can be a Habit, Daily, or To Do. Continue completing them to receive all sorts of rewards!
Keep it up! If you need help planning tasks, try thinking about what you’d like to do during a specific time of day
Combine your %1$s Egg and %2$s Potion to hatch this pet!
Equipment is a way to customize your avatar and improve your stats
Complete tasks to get food! You can feed it to your pet from Pets & Mounts
Check off any of your tasks to earn rewards
Complete tasks to get a Hatching Potion and Egg then hatch your Pet!
Add a task for something you would like to accomplish this week

Between September %1$s and %2$s, simply purchase any Gem bundle like usual and your account will be credited with the promotional amount of Gems. More Gems to spend, share, or save for any future releases!
You can still send messages, but no one can send them to you. You can enable again from Settings.
A blocked user cannot send you Private Messages but you will still see their posts. This will have no effect if the person is a moderator now or in the future.
The Gem Sale is back to haunt the very end of this year’s Fall Gala! This is one last chance to get more Gems than ever, so stock up while it lasts!
Between %1$s and %2$s, simply purchase any Gem bundle like usual and your account will be credited with the promotional amount of Gems. More Gems to spend, share, or save for any future releases!
The Fall Gala is in full swing so we thought it was the perfect time for a Gem Sale! Now you will get more Gems with each purchase than ever before.
Allow Habitica notifications in the Settings app to receive push notifications
Reminders may be delayed because permissions aren\'t enabled. Tap to view and update permissions.
Allow `Alarms & Reminders` in the Settings app to ensure reminders appear at the scheduled time exactly
This will remove your current class and refund all stat points then let you select a new class
This will leave you without an assigned class. You can choose a class again by enabling the class system from Settings at any time.

This will switch which gear is unlocked in shops and change your available skills
